title: [solved]820-3115 no green light, seems i am missing something.
message:
820-3115
 
No green light
Pp3v42_g3h                       3.4v
SMC_BC_ACOK                3.3v
SMC_BC_ACOK_VCC      3.46v
ADAPTER_SENSE             3.4v
sys_onewire                        3.4v
Ppbus_g3h                         12.5 volt
 
Q5480 2 pins broken off, removed and cleaned trace. (fixed
R5481 corroded replaced (fixed)
CHRG_acin has 4,4v

title: [solved]820-3115 no green light, seems i am missing something.
message: either bad DC In board, shit under the SMC, or bad SMC. My guess on the latter two.

title: [solved]820-3115 no green light, seems i am missing something.
message: Yeah. So long as you got rid of the entire edge bonding in one piece it is safe to simply reflow it altogether.
